name: dass21_en
title: Depression, Anxiety, and Stress Scale â€“ 21 Items (DASS-21)
description: The DASS-21 is a 21-item self-report questionnaire designed to measure the severity of symptoms related to depression, anxiety, and stress experienced over the past week.
disclaimer: This questionnaire is for informational and self-monitoring purposes only and does not constitute a diagnosis of any mental health condition. Only a qualified mental health professional can provide a diagnosis.
source: Developed by S.H. Lovibond and P.F. Lovibond. Available at psy.unsw.edu.au/dass

questions.title: I found it hard to wind down

options.label: Did not apply to me at all
Applied to me to some degree, or some of the time
Applied to me to a considerable degree or a good part of the time
Applied to me very much or most of the time

questions.title: I was aware of dryness of my mouth

options.label: Did not apply to me at all
Applied to me to some degree, or some of the time
Applied to me to a considerable degree or a good part of the time
Applied to me very much or most of the time

questions.title: I couldn't seem to experience any positive feeling at all

interpretation.label: Normal level of depression symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a normal level of reported depression symptoms. Continue monitoring your well-being.

interpretation.label: Mild level of depression symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a mild level of reported depression symptoms. Consider engaging in self-care activities and continued self-monitoring.

interpretation.label: Moderate level of depression symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a moderate level of reported depression symptoms. You may find benefit in exploring professional support.

interpretation.label: Severe level of depression symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a severe level of reported depression symptoms. It is strongly recommended that you consider consulting a mental health professional.

interpretation.label: Extremely severe level of depression symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest an extremely severe level of reported depression symptoms. It is highly recommended that you seek immediate consultation with a mental health professional.

interpretation.label: Normal level of anxiety symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a normal level of reported anxiety symptoms. Continue monitoring your well-being.

interpretation.label: Mild level of anxiety symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a mild level of reported anxiety symptoms. Consider engaging in self-care activities and continued self-monitoring.

interpretation.label: Moderate level of anxiety symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a moderate level of reported anxiety symptoms. You may find benefit in exploring professional support.

interpretation.label: Severe level of anxiety symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a severe level of reported anxiety symptoms. It is strongly recommended that you consider consulting a mental health professional.

interpretation.label: Extremely severe level of anxiety symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest an extremely severe level of reported anxiety symptoms. It is highly recommended that you seek immediate consultation with a mental health professional.

interpretation.label: Normal level of stress symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a normal level of reported stress symptoms. Continue monitoring your well-being.

interpretation.label: Mild level of stress symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a mild level of reported stress symptoms. Consider engaging in self-care activities and continued self-monitoring.

interpretation.label: Moderate level of stress symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a moderate level of reported stress symptoms. You may find benefit in exploring stress management techniques and potentially professional support.

interpretation.label: Severe level of stress symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest a severe level of reported stress symptoms. It is strongly recommended that you consider consulting a mental health professional.

interpretation.label: Extremely severe level of stress symptoms reported
interpretation.recommendation: Your responses suggest an extremely severe level of reported stress symptoms. It is highly recommended that you seek immediate consultation with a mental health professional.
